import logo from '../images/Vector.svg'; import '../index.css'; import Header from './Header' import Footer from './Footer' import Main from './Main' function App() { function handleEditProfileClick() { const buttonProfile = document.querySelector('.profile__edit-button'); const popup = document.querySelector('.popup_edit'); buttonProfile.addEventListener('click', () => { popup.classList.add('popup_opened') }) } function handleEditProfileClick() { const buttonAdd = document.querySelector('.profile__add-button'); const popupAdd = document.querySelector('.popup_add'); buttonAdd .addEventListener('click', () => { popupAdd.classList.add('popup_opened') }) } function handleEditAvatarClick() { const buttonAvatar = document.querySelector('.profile__avatar-btn'); const popup = document.querySelector('.popup_avatar'); buttonProfile.addEventListener('click', () => { popup.classList.add('popup_opened') }) } return (
